channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13010] HFileOutputFormat2 partitioner's path is hard-coded as '/tmp'
item.description: Instead we should use ${hadoop.tmp.dir} which maps to /tmp/hadoop-${user.name} as the users may not have write access to /tmp.
item.summary: HFileOutputFormat2 partitioner's path is hard-coded as '/tmp'

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attaching patch to the effect.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12697937/0001-HBASE-13010-HFileOutputFormat2-partitioner-s-path-is.patch
